### Comprehensive Description for Fine-Grained Classification

#### Summary of Overall Appearance:
The image features a young puppy with a light golden-brown coat, lying on its back on a carpeted floor. The puppy has a curious and endearing expression, with wide-open dark eyes and a black nose. Its ears are floppy and hang down on either side of its head, contributing to its charming appearance. The puppy's body is small and compact, with a rounded and plump shape typical of puppies. The fur is smooth, short to medium-length, and covers the entire visible body, including the head, legs, and torso.
